segment.source: Read the end user license agreement (EULA) in its entirety for important information.
segment.target: Read the end user license agreement (EULA) in its entirety for important information.

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: Read the end user license agreement (EULA) in its entirety.
segment.target: Read the end user license agreement (EULA) in its entirety.

segment.source: The EULA contains important information including text that must appear within your own privacy policy and/or terms of use statement when your app uses advertising.
segment.target: The EULA contains important information including text that must appear within your own privacy policy and/or terms of use statement when your app uses advertising.

segment.source: Make sure your app complies with all sections of the EULA, including those related to Redistribution Requirements, Data Collection and Use and Additional Agreements.
segment.target: Make sure your app complies with all sections of the EULA, including those related to Redistribution Requirements, Data Collection and Use and Additional Agreements.

segment.source: The EULA can be found in the folder where your Extension SDKs are located.
segment.target: The EULA can be found in the folder where your Extension SDKs are located.

segment.source: Your folder may be different depending on the options you chose during installation.
segment.target: Your folder may be different depending on the options you chose during installation.

segment.source: The default installation path is C:Program Files (x86)Microsoft SDKsWindows Kits10ExtensionSDKsMicrosoft.AdMediator.Universal1.0.
segment.target: The default installation path is C:Program Files (x86)Microsoft SDKsWindows Kits10ExtensionSDKsMicrosoft.AdMediator.Universal1.0.

segment.source: Submit an app with ads to the Windows Store
segment.target: Submit an app with ads to the Windows Store
